analyzed: sarva cora dhūrta manuṣya amanuṣya bhayam na bhaviṣyati

original: atha te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta /

translated: Then those Bodhisattva Mahasattvas spoke these words:

analyzed: bhagavan su bhāṣitā iyam vāc
translated: Blessed One, this speech is well spoken.

analyzed: atha ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

translated: Om. Savitri, nurse, mother, glory of the four Vedas, Lakshmi, mother of beings, Jaya, Vijaya, Ganga, all holy places,
